title: [Large-scale] Digital Badge-Based Program to Enhance Motivation in Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Concepts and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Gamification-based learning motivation program in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can achieve weekly learning objectives at 80% or higher by earning digital badges
Learners participate at 90% or higher in scientific problem-solving activities provided in game-based learning design
Learners can self-directly manage learning progress at 70% or higher using a digital badge system

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
